body: "Last week, the CPJ reported on a series of threats against Oscar de León, a television journalist with the Guatevisión TV network. The CPJ is calling on Guatemalan authorities to investigate the source of the threats and to take steps to protect De León," Mike reports at Central American Politics.
original_body: "Last week, the CPJ reported on a series of threats against Oscar de León, a television journalist with the Guatevisión TV network. The CPJ is calling on Guatemalan authorities to investigate the source of the threats and to take steps to protect De León," Mike reports at Central American Politics.
title: Guatemala: Threats Against Journalist Oscar de León

sentence: "Last week, the CPJ reported on a series of threats against Oscar de León, a television journalist with the Guatevisión TV network.
The CPJ is calling on Guatemalan authorities to investigate the source of the threats and to take steps to protect De León," Mike reports at Central American Politics.
